Comments.Message: how the heck did you get theralion's mirror out of that code??? lol

oh lol I could of sworn that I had that checked off, i see why now, have it equiped but not checked off. It used to ask me if i wanted to include the item instead of erroring out. lol ok thanks alot for the very fast response!!!
